original_text:
Therefore this is what the Lord, the Lord Almighty, says:
“My people who live in Zion,
    do not be afraid of the Assyrians,
who beat you with a rod
    and lift up a club against you, as Egypt did.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 시온에 거주하는 내 백성들아 앗수르가 애굽이 한 것처럼 막대기로 너를 때리며 몽둥이를 들어 너를 칠지라도 그를 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Therefore this is what the Lord, the Lord Almighty, says:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주 만군의 여호와께서 이렇게 말씀하시니라:

sentences.original_text: My people who live in Zion,
do not be afraid of the Assyrians,
who beat you with a rod
and lift up a club against you,
